title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: The current implementation of StyledText in the software performs inefficient redraws during text changes with word wrap. These redraws are excessive and can negatively impact performance.
EB: To improve performance and efficiency, there should be a maximum of one redraw for each visible line during text changes with word wrap.
SR: To reproduce the issue and observe multiple redraws occurring, add the following line to the `StyledText.performPaint` method: `System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);`
